name: Rocs-Hardcore-Nauvis
title: Hard Nauvis
author: thesixthroc
description:
Difficulty tweaks for Nauvis. Nights are darker, some ores are mixed, flamethrowers and locomotives use more fuel, and shotguns are stronger.

Certain dependencies are intended to be included by default, but are listed as optional for better customizability. To get the full experience, enable this mod via the Space Age: Hard Mode modpack.
